overview: With the arrival of flash delivery people, our groceries are now at the door within 10 minutes, but Dolf takes a very different approach during his performance. In a 100-minute show, he tries to make chocolate of the turbulent year 2022. From the lockdown we ended up in a European war and other transgressive behavior. After a slutty summer 2.0, another World Cup will follow where you wouldn't put your forced laborers to work yet. And then we haven't even mentioned the countless unexpected events that will pass by in the coming months. Enough to discuss!
title: Flitsbezorgd
